import React from 'react';
import Cascader from 'kpc-react/components/cascader';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "data": [

                            "children": [
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyanglou",
                                    "label": "岳阳楼区"
                                },
                                {
                                    "value": "yueyangxian",
                                    "label": "岳阳县"
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        };
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Cascader data={this.state.data} value={this.state.value} on$change-value={(c, value) => this.setState({value})} changeOnSelect />
                You selected: {JSON.stringify(this.state.value)}
            </div>
        )
    }
}
